name: ghostfolio
description: Ghostfolio is a self-hosted investment and portfolio tracker with detailed analytics, portfolio breakdowns, and financial dashboards. It supports multiple brokers and integrates live data with a privacy-first approach.
features: Portfolio Tracking: Monitor investment portfolios across multiple brokers and asset classes in one platform.
Financial Analytics: Analyze performance, allocation, dividends, and returns with detailed charts and metrics.
Multi-Broker Support: Aggregate holdings from various brokers and financial institutions.
Live Data Integration: Fetch real-time market data and prices for accurate portfolio valuation.
Privacy-First: Self-host your financial data without sharing sensitive information with third parties.
Asset Allocation: Visualize portfolio diversification across sectors, regions, and asset types.
Performance Metrics: Track historical returns, volatility, and benchmark comparisons over time.
Transaction History: Record and review all investment transactions with detailed reporting.
